text: (napiye! Munnar) nam evarkalukku vetam kotuttirukkiromo avarkal umakku irakkappatta (ivvetat)taip parri makilcciyataivarkal. Eninum, i(vvetat)til cilavarrai nirakarippavarkalum avarkalil untu. Akave, nir (avarkalai nokki,) â€˜â€˜allahvukku etaiyum inaivaikkatu, avan oruvanaiye nan vanankumpati enakkuk kattalaiyitappattullatu. (Unkalai) nan avanitame alaikkiren; nanum avanitame tirumpac celven'' enru kuruviraka
